sentences.sentence: Baked-to-Last Blushers offer customers a choice of two colour ways that enhance the complexion with subtle shimmering colour that lasts up to 8 hours.
sentences.translation: 意式烘焙持久给亲们选择两种颜色的方式，肤色有微妙的波光粼粼的色彩，持续8小时。

sentences.sentence: Using the touch-sensitive screen, you can choose from more than 50 different eye colors, around the same number of lip colors, and 12 blushers, bronzers and cheek tints.
sentences.translation: 通过触屏显示器，你可以从50多种眼影、唇彩和12种胭脂、阴影粉和腮红中任意选择。
